title: Fundamentals of Artificial Intelligence
description: Introduction to AIML, AI/DS, branch specializations, applications.

modules.content: Introduction to AI, history, key milestones, and branches. Discuss the Turing test, symbolic AI, statistical AI, and modern deep learning approaches.
Role of data science in AI, fundamental techniques. Supervised vs. unsupervised learning, data preprocessing, feature engineering.

title: Web Development with React
description: Learn how to build dynamic web applications using React.

modules.content: Introduction to React and its component-based architecture. JSX, props, state, and component lifecycle.
examples: Building a basic to-do list app

modules.content: Local state, lifting state up, using props efficiently.
examples: User authentication state in an app

title: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Explore basic ML concepts and algorithms.

modules.moduleDescription: What is ML and why it matters.
modules.content: Supervised, unsupervised, reinforcement learning.
Linear regression, logistic regression, decision trees.

title: Advanced React Techniques
description: Dive deep into React for building scalable applications.

modules.content: Code splitting, lazy loading, React Profiler.
examples: Reducing render time for large apps

modules.content: `React.lazy()`, dynamic imports.

title: Data Visualization with D3.js
description: Learn how to create interactive data visualizations.

modules.moduleDescription: What is D3 and why use it?
modules.content: Data-driven documents, working with SVG.
Enter, update, exit pattern.
examples: Building a pie chart with D3

title: Python for Data Science
description: Master Python for data analysis, visualization, and machine learning.

modules.content: This module covers the syntax and fundamental programming constructs of Python, including variables, data types, loops, functions, and error handling.
Learn how to manipulate and analyze large datasets using pandas for dataframes and NumPy for numerical computations.
Explore how to create compelling visual representations of data using libraries like Matplotlib and Seaborn.
Introduction to supervised and unsupervised learning, including linear regression, classification, clustering, and feature engineering.
Apply your learning by working on a data science project, from data cleaning to model training and evaluation.

title: Full-Stack Web Development
description: Become a full-stack developer using MERN stack.

modules.content: Covers HTML structure, semantic elements, and CSS styling techniques including Flexbox and Grid.
Introduction to JavaScript ES6+, covering DOM manipulation, event handling, and asynchronous programming.
Fundamentals of React, including components, state management, hooks, and routing.
Covers setting up a Node.js server, creating REST APIs using Express.js, and handling authentication.
Introduction to MongoDB, creating schemas, performing CRUD operations, and integrating with a backend.

title: UI/UX Design Essentials
description: Learn the principles of UI/UX design and how to create user-friendly interfaces.

modules.content: Introduction to design principles including color theory, typography, and layout design.
Learn how to conduct user research through surveys, interviews, and usability testing.
Creating low-fidelity wireframes using tools like Figma and Adobe XD.
Developing high-fidelity prototypes and using design systems for consistency.
Analyzing usability tests to improve user experience and accessibility.

title: Mobile App Development - React
description: Build cross-platform mobile applications using React Native and Expo.

modules.content: Learn how to set up React Native with Expo and understand the component structure.
Creating reusable components and implementing navigation using React Navigation.
Learn about state management using React Context API and Redux.
Best practices for styling using StyleSheet API and libraries like Styled Components.
How to build, test, and publish your mobile application to App Store and Google Play.

title: Introduction to Cloud Computing
description: Learn the basics of cloud computing and services like AWS and Azure.

modules.content: Introduction to cloud computing, its advantages, and deployment models (Public, Private, Hybrid).
Overview of AWS services like EC2, S3, Lambda, and IAM for managing cloud resources.
Understanding Azure cloud infrastructure, virtual machines, and Azure Functions.
Securing cloud applications using IAM, encryption, and compliance best practices.
Best practices for deploying scalable applications on AWS and Azure.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Master Python for data analysis, visualization, and machine learning.

modules.content: This module covers the fundamentals of Python programming, including syntax, data types, control structures, and functions. You will learn how to write and execute Python programs and understand its powerful libraries.
Learn how to work with datasets using pandas and NumPy. You will explore data structures, perform data cleaning, and manipulate data effectively for analysis.
Understand the importance of data visualization in analytics. Learn how to create various charts, graphs, and heatmaps using Matplotlib and Seaborn to represent data effectively.
Get an introduction to machine learning concepts and implement basic models using Scikit-learn. Learn about regression, classification, clustering, and model evaluation.
Apply the skills you've learned in a real-world project. Work on data cleaning, analysis, visualization, and model building to derive insights and predictions from data.

title: Full-Stack Web Development
description: Become a full-stack developer using MERN stack.

modules.content: Understand the basics of HTML and CSS. Learn about semantic markup, responsive design, CSS Flexbox, and Grid to build structured and visually appealing web pages.
Get familiar with JavaScript, its syntax, and how it enhances interactivity on web pages. Learn about ES6 features, event handling, and DOM manipulation.
Learn React.js to build dynamic and scalable front-end applications. Understand components, state management, hooks, and lifecycle methods.
Explore server-side development using Node.js and Express.js. Learn about RESTful APIs, middleware, authentication, and database integration.
Learn how to use MongoDB as a NoSQL database for managing web applications. Understand schema design, CRUD operations, and aggregation.

title: UI/UX Design Essentials
description: Learn the principles of UI/UX design and how to create user-friendly interfaces.

modules.content: Understand the fundamentals of UI/UX design, including color theory, typography, contrast, and consistency in user interfaces.
Learn how to conduct user research through surveys, interviews, and usability testing. Understand how to gather insights and improve designs.
Create wireframes using tools like Figma or Adobe XD. Understand the importance of layout structure and user flow in web and mobile applications.
Design and build interactive prototypes using software tools. Learn how to create high-fidelity designs for better user experience testing.
Understand usability testing techniques to evaluate the effectiveness of your designs. Learn how to gather feedback and make improvements.

title: DevOps for Beginners Full Course
description: Learn the basics of DevOps, including CI/CD, containerization, and automation.

modules.moduleDescription: What is DevOps? Learn the importance of DevOps in modern software development.
modules.content: This module introduces DevOps, explaining how it bridges the gap between development and operations. Key topics include Agile methodologies, automation, and CI/CD principles.
Learn about Continuous Integration (CI), the process of merging code changes frequently. Topics include Jenkins, GitHub Actions, and best practices for automated testing.
This module covers Continuous Deployment (CD), automating software releases. Learn about Kubernetes, Docker, and cloud deployment strategies.
Explore how containers work, the difference between virtual machines and containers, and an introduction to Docker and Kubernetes for managing containerized applications.
Learn about observability in DevOps, using tools like Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK stack for monitoring logs, metrics, and performance.

title: Introduction to Blockchain
description: Understand the fundamentals of blockchain technology.

modules.content: This module explains what blockchain is, its structure, and why it's considered secure. Learn about decentralization and the fundamentals of distributed ledgers.
Understand how cryptographic techniques like hashing, digital signatures, and public-private keys are used to secure blockchain transactions.
Learn about decentralized networks, how they work, and the advantages they offer over traditional centralized systems.
Discover smart contracts, how they work, and how they eliminate intermediaries. Explore Ethereum and Solidity programming for smart contracts.
Explore how blockchain is transforming industries like finance, supply chain, healthcare, and digital identity management.

title: Introduction to SEO
description: Learn the basics of Search Engine Optimization to improve website rankings.

modules.content: Understand how search engines work, the importance of SEO, and how websites are ranked using different factors like relevance and authority.
Learn how to find the best keywords using tools like Google Keyword Planner, Ahrefs, and SEMrush for optimizing content.
This module covers title tags, meta descriptions, headers, and keyword optimization for improving page rankings.
Learn about link building, guest posting, and social signals that help improve website authority.
Understand how to use SEO tools like Google Analytics, Search Console, and Moz for performance tracking.

title: JavaScript Essentials Full Course
description: Master JavaScript, the foundation of modern web development.

modules.content: Learn the basics of JavaScript syntax, data types, variables, and operators, and how to write and execute JavaScript code.
Understand how to manipulate HTML elements using JavaScript with methods like getElementById, querySelector, and event listeners.
Explore ES6 features such as arrow functions, template literals, spread/rest operators, destructuring, and promises.
Learn how asynchronous programming works in JavaScript using callbacks, promises, and async/await.
Work on real-world projects like a to-do app, weather application, and interactive forms.

title: JavaScript Essentials Full Course
description: Master JavaScript, the foundation of modern web development.

modules.content: This module covers JavaScript syntax, variables, data types, and operators. It introduces control structures like loops and conditionals, along with functions and scope.
Learn how to manipulate the Document Object Model (DOM) using JavaScript. Topics include selecting elements, handling events, modifying styles, and dynamic content updates.
Explore ES6+ features such as let and const, template literals, arrow functions, destructuring, spread/rest operators, and promises.
Understand asynchronous programming in JavaScript using callbacks, promises, and async/await to handle API calls and asynchronous operations efficiently.
Apply JavaScript concepts by building a small project such as a to-do list, weather app, or interactive webpage with event listeners and API integration.

title: React Native Fundamentals
description: Build mobile apps using React Native and Expo.

modules.content: Learn how to set up React Native development environment using Expo and CLI. Understand the folder structure and core dependencies.
Explore built-in components such as View, Text, Image, TextInput, and Button. Learn how to structure and style components efficiently.
Understand navigation in React Native using React Navigation. Learn about stack navigation, tab navigation, and drawer navigation.
Learn how to manage state using useState, useEffect, and Context API. Understand how to share state between components efficiently.
Discover how to build and publish React Native apps on the App Store and Google Play. Learn about app signing, testing, and release management.

title: Introduction to SQL Full Course
description: Learn the basics of SQL for managing databases.

modules.content: Understand SQL syntax, database structure, and how to execute basic SELECT queries to retrieve data.
Learn how to manipulate data within a database using SQL statements for inserting, updating, and deleting records.
Master advanced SELECT queries with filtering, sorting, and aggregate functions to analyze data efficiently.
Understand SQL joins including INNER JOIN, LEFT JOIN, RIGHT JOIN, and FULL JOIN to combine data from multiple tables.
Explore complex queries using subqueries, indexing strategies for performance optimization, and best practices for database design.

title: Modern CSS Techniques
description: Learn CSS Grid, Flexbox, and modern styling techniques for responsive design.

modules.content: Understand CSS syntax, selectors, properties, and how to apply styles effectively to HTML elements.
Learn how to use CSS Flexbox for creating responsive and flexible layouts with proper alignment and spacing.
Explore the CSS Grid system, defining rows, columns, and responsive layouts using grid-template-areas.
Implement responsive design techniques using media queries, relative units, and fluid layouts for different screen sizes.
Discover CSS animations, transitions, and keyframe animations to enhance user experience in web applications.

title: Introduction to Node.js
description: Learn server-side JavaScript with Node.js and Express.

modules.content: Understand what Node.js is, how it works, and how to set up a Node.js environment.
Learn about built-in Node.js modules, npm packages, and how to use third-party libraries.

modules.moduleDescription: Setting up a server with Express.
modules.content: Understand how to create RESTful APIs using Express.js, middleware, and route handling.
Learn about middleware functions in Express and how to process incoming HTTP requests.
Discover how to deploy Node.js applications using services like Heroku, AWS, or DigitalOcean.
